content.description:
An angle of measure theta is in standard position with initial ray on the x-axis, vertex at the origin, and terminal ray in Quadrant 2.

The terminal ray in Quadrant 2 intersects the circle at point P.

A line segment begins at the origin and ends at point R, which lies on the circle in Quadrant 3.

A dashed vertical line segment extends from point P to point R. The segment is perpendicular to the x axis.

A dashed horizontal line segment extends from point P to a point on the y axis. The segment is perpendicular to the y axis.

​​​The figure shows a circle centered at the origin with an angle of measure <math alttext="theta"> <semantics> <mi>θ</mi> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math> radians in standard position. The terminal ray of the angle intersects the circle at point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and point <math alttext="R"><semantics><mi>R</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> also lies on the circle. The coordinates of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are <math alttext="open parentheses x comma y close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the coordinates of <math alttext="R"><semantics><mi>R</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are <math alttext="open parentheses x comma negative y close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.
content.question: Which of the following is true about the sine of <math alttext="theta"> <semantics> <mi>θ</mi> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="sin theta equals x over 5"><semantics><mpadded lspace="+2px"><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mpadded><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> , because it is the ratio of the horizontal displacement of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> from the <math alttext="y"><semantics><mi>y</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis to the distance between the origin and <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​<math alttext="sin theta equals x over 5"><semantics><mpadded lspace="+2px"><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mpadded><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> , because it is the ratio of the horizontal displacement of <math alttext="R"><semantics><mi>R</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> from the <math alttext="y"><semantics><mi>y</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis to the distance between the origin and <math alttext="R"><semantics><mi>R</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​​<math alttext="sin theta equals fraction numerator negative y over denominator 5 end fraction"><semantics><mpadded lspace="+2px"><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>-</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mpadded><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> , because it is the ratio of the vertical displacement of <math alttext="R"><semantics><mi>R</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> from the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis to the distance between the origin and <math alttext="R"><semantics><mi>R</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​<math alttext="sin theta equals y over 5"><semantics><mpadded lspace="+2px"><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mpadded><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> , because it is the ratio of the vertical displacement of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> from the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis to the distance between the origin and <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.
